title: The Shadows
description: Kaitlin Prest, creator and host of the Prix-Italia winner The Heart, presents the first audio fiction from CBC Podcasts. The Shadows is a story about the anatomy of a relationship: a crush, a choice,  ...

episodes.title: Episode 1: Romantic
episodes.subtitle:
"When love beckons to you, follow [it]
...
And when [its] wings enfold you yield to [it],
Though the sword hidden among [its] pinions may wound you.
...
For even as love crowns you so shall [it] crucify you.
Even as [it] is for your growth so is [it] for your pruning." - Kahlil Gibran, On Love
episodes.description:
"When love beckons to you, follow [it]
...
And when [its] wings enfold you yield to [it],
Though the sword hidden among [its] pinions may wound you.
...
For even as love crowns you so shall [it] crucify you.
Even as [it] is for your growth so is [it] for your pruning." - Kahlil Gibran, On Love

episodes.title: Episode 2: Realist
episodes.subtitle: "These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them." - Rumi
episodes.description: "These pains you feel are messengers. Listen to them." - Rumi

episodes.title: Episode 3: Sweater
episodes.subtitle: "Love is being there every day, to keep someone warm, to hold them through the night, to make them feel cozy." - Sweater
episodes.description: "Love is being there every day, to keep someone warm, to hold them through the night, to make them feel cozy." - Sweater

episodes.title: Episode 4: Decision
episodes.subtitle: "Romantics value intensity over stability. Realists value security over passion. But both are often disappointed, for few people can live happily at either extreme." - Esther Perel, Mating in Captivity
episodes.description: "Romantics value intensity over stability. Realists value security over passion. But both are often disappointed, for few people can live happily at either extreme." - Esther Perel, Mating in Captivity

episodes.title: Episode 5: An Argument That Should Be Simple.
episodes.subtitle: "A decided heart looks for a solution. An undecided heart looks for a way out." - Tom, a regular at the Bramasole Diner
episodes.description: "A decided heart looks for a solution. An undecided heart looks for a way out." - Tom, a regular at the Bramasole Diner

episodes.title: Episode 6: End
episodes.subtitle: "With every commitment there is much that it rejects. Much that it excludes." - Adam Phillips, Unforbidden Pleasures
episodes.description: "With every commitment there is much that it rejects. Much that it excludes." - Adam Phillips, Unforbidden Pleasures
